Module com.bd
Package model

Class Appointments

java.lang.Object
model.Appointments
public class Appointments extends Object
The Appointments class provides methods for retrieving appointment information.
Author:
Brandi Davis

    • isOverlap

      public static boolean isOverlap(int customerId, LocalDateTime origStartTime, LocalDateTime origEndTime, LocalDateTime newStartTime, LocalDateTime newEndTime)
      Checks to see if there are any overlaps for customer appointment times.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer to check for appointment overlap
      origStartTime - the first start time and date of the customer's appointment
      origEndTime - the first end time and date of the customer's appointment
      newStartTime - the second start time and date of the customer's appointment
      newEndTime - the second end time and date of the customer's appointment
      Returns:
      boolean value depending on if there is an overlap or not

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(Appointments appointment)
      Adds an appointment to the all appointments Observable list.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to be added
